5. Does VisIt support stereo rendering?

Yes, VisIt supports stereo rendering on Linux and Windows systems. You will need a video card that supports stereographic display and a pair of stereographic glasses. When you want to use stereo rendering on a Windows system you should use the VisIt 2.X.X in stereo shortcut. When you want to use stereo rendering on a Linux system you should provide the -stereo command line option when you start VisIt at the command prompt.
